hanzi-su-wiki:
譜

Значения

Нота; последовательная запись

Мнемоника

Фиксировать речь 言 на письме, чтобы потом широко 普 использовать. Записывать последовательно.

Варианты

谱

Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: музыкальное сопровождение, музыка, нота, персонал, стол, генеалогия
koohiiStory1: Musical scores are in a universal language.
koohiiStory2: A musical score can be read, but not like ordinary words. Music is a universal language.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic:
If you say the lineup of your family members that have lived on this earth under the sun, you're really explaining your genealogy.
This kanji has a second meaning too. It means score. So if you're saying the line up of what happened today under the sun you're really just saying the score of a game. So which is it? Are you talking about the past or something that happened today? That's what makes the difference.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Say the line up of what happened under the sun. It's the genealogy of your family or the score of your game!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: if you can't tell the difference between your genealogy and a game's score you're a fool (ふ) and I can't help you. You aren't a fool, are you? You know the difference.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Your family genealogy and your game's score aren't even close to being the same thing. Memorize these or everyone will think you're a fool.
Ru_Meaning: musical score, music, note, staff, table, genealogy
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 二 (два), 并, 日 (день), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese:
pǔ: (сущ/глаг) ноты, партитура; много уверенности; важничанье, надменные манеры; сочинять (музыку)
pǔ: (графема) записывать в удобной форме (напр., в виде графика или таблицы); руководство, справочник, путеводитель
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the universal (普) words (言) are music
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A musical score is like universal words for all musicians just like putonghua is the universal dialect of Chinese in China.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to " pu " sound, the original meaning is books and tables compiled according to the category or system of things. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Jilu also. Congyan, Pusheng. "Historical Records" from the merger." Tang Liu Zhiji "Shitong‧ Biaoli": "The name of the cover spectrum began in the Zhou Dynasty, and the table was made , Because of the spectrum pictogram."

" Score " can mean music score. Tang Yaohe "On the New Home with Friends": "Looking for a teacher, looking for medicine, and playing the piano according to the music."

" Pu " can also mean composition. Song Xin Qiji, "Wanxisha‧ Become a Master and Give a Sex to Zen Master": "The sound of the accustomed to listening to the piano should be composable, and the fish array can be arranged."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yan " to " common " sound, the original meaning is books and tables compiled according to the category or system of things.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「普」聲，本義為按事物的類別或系統編成的書籍、表冊。《說文新附》：「籍錄也。从言，普聲。《史記》从並。」 唐劉知幾《史通‧表歷》：「蓋譜之建名，起於周代，表之所作，因譜象形。」

　　「譜」可表示曲譜。唐姚合〈和友人新居園上〉：「尋師望藥力，依譜上琴聲。」

　　「譜」還可表示作曲。宋辛棄疾《浣溪沙‧別成上人並送性禪師》：「慣聽琴聲應可譜，飽觀魚陣已能排。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「普」聲，本義為按事物的類別或系統編成的書籍、表冊。

(Simplified: 谱)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 普 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 普 [ pǔ ] widespread, universal, general
①依照事物的類別、系統制的表冊：年譜。家譜。食譜。菜譜。譜系(ａ．家譜上的系統；b．物種變化的系統)。
②記錄音樂、棋局等的符號或圖形：歌譜。樂譜。棋譜。畫譜。譜號。譜表。
③編寫歌譜：譜曲。譜寫。譜制。
譜寫 [ pǔ xiě ]: to compose (a piece of music); (fig.) to create, by one's actions, a narrative (generally one that can be recounted with pride)
(Simplified: 谱)

楽譜(がくふ): score (music)

從「 言 」，「 普 」聲，本義為按事物的類別或系統編成的書籍、表冊。《說文新附》：「籍錄也。从言，普聲。《史記》从並。」 唐劉知幾《史通‧表歷》：「蓋譜之建名，起於周代，表之所作，因譜象形。」 「 譜 」可表示曲譜。唐姚合〈和友人新居園上〉：「尋師望藥力，依譜上琴聲。」 「 譜 」還可表示作曲。宋辛棄疾《浣溪沙‧別成上人並送性禪師》：「慣聽琴聲應可譜，飽觀魚陣已能排。」
From " yan" to " pu" sound, the original meaning is books and tables compiled according to the category or system of things. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Jilu also. Congyan, Pusheng. "Historical Records" from the merger." Tang Liu Zhiji "Shitong‧ Biaoli": "The name of the cover spectrum began in the Zhou Dynasty, and the table was made , Because of the spectrum pictogram." " Score" can mean music score. Tang Yaohe "On the New Home with Friends": "Looking for a teacher, looking for medicine, and playing the piano according to the music." " Pu" can also mean composition. Song Xin Qiji, "Wanxisha‧ Become a Master and Give a Sex to Zen Master": "The sound of the accustomed to listening to the piano should be composable, and the fish array can be arranged."

譜字的基本解释

譜
pǔ
见“谱”。

譜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pǔ］
［《廣韻》博古切，上姥，幫。］
“谱1”的繁体字。亦作“諩1”。
(1)按照事物的类别或系統编排记录。
(2)引申为布置。
(3)按照事物类别或系統编成的表册、书籍。
(4)曲谱。
(5)作曲。
(6)大致的标准；依据。
(7)犹左右。表示约数。
(8)件；桩。

譜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譜； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1182第12
【唐韻】【正韻】博古切【集韻】【韻會】彼五切，?音補。【說文】籍錄也。【廣雅】牒也。【玉篇】屬也。【釋名】布也，布列見其事也。【文心雕龍】總領黎庶，則有譜籍簿錄。譜者，普也。註序世統事資周普，鄭氏譜詩，蓋取乎此。【詩序】以立斯譜。【孔疏】譜亦是序類。避子夏序名，以其列諸侯世及詩之次，故名譜也。【史記·三代世表】自殷以前，諸侯不可得而譜。【前漢·劉歆傳】歆著《三統歷譜》。【舊唐書·經籍志】譜系以紀世族繼序。　又【集韻】或作諩。【春秋序】譜第。【註】譜，本又作諩。　【說文】本作?。

譜字的源字形

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pǔ]
["Guangyun" Boguqie, grandma, help. ]
Traditional characters of "谱1". Also known as "諩1".
(1) Arrange records according to the category or system of things.
(2) The extension is layout.
(3) Lists and books compiled according to the category or system of things.
(4) Scores.
(5) Composition.
(6) Rough standards; basis.
(7) Still left and right. Represents approximate numbers.
(8) Pieces; piles.

Name meaning

pǔ
вм. 谱
Radicals: 言, 並, 日  (say, line-up, sun)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you say the lineup of your family members that have lived on this earth under the sun, you're really explaining your genealogy.
This kanji has a second meaning too. It means score. So if you're saying the line up of what happened today under the sun you're really just saying the score of a game. So which is it? Are you talking about the past or something that happened today? That's what makes the difference.
Say the line up of what happened under the sun. It's the genealogy of your family or the score of your game!
Reading Mnemonic
if you can't tell the difference between your genealogy and a game's score you're a fool (ふ) and I can't help you. You aren't a fool, are you? You know the difference.
Your family genealogy and your game's score aren't even close to being the same thing. Memorize these or everyone will think you're a fool.
